title: documentation for indexing trec collections
description:
In LUCENE-1540 there are great improvements for parsing the various format differences
of some common TREC collections.

It would be nice to engage new users (especially students/academics/experimenters) if
we had some simple instructions on how to do a TREC run on the lucene website.

For reference see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LUCENE-1540?focusedCommentId=12995865&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-12995865
